tweet_text: @katieharr1988 It probably depends on how generous the glasses are. Traditionally there are 6 glasses of wine in a bottle (125ml = a glass). But lots of wine glasses are a lot bigger than that. Given the 1-2 drinks estimate, I suggest a bottle to 3-4 attendees.
text_en: It probably depends on how generous the glasses are. Traditionally there are glasses of wine in a bottle (125ml = a glass). But lots of wine glasses are a lot bigger than that. Given the -2 drinks estimate, I suggest a bottle to -4 attendees.
